00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include "cinder/Cinder.h"
00026 #include "cinder/Vector.h"
00027 
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <utility>
00030 #include <boost/rational.hpp>
00031 
00032 namespace cinder {
00033 
00034 template<typename T>
00035 class AreaT {
00036  public:
00037     AreaT() {}
00038     AreaT( const Vec2<T> &UL, const Vec2<T> &LR );
00039     AreaT( T aX1, T aY1, T aX2, T aY2 )
00040         { set( aX1, aY1, aX2, aY2 ); }
00041     template<typename Y>
00042     explicit AreaT( const AreaT<Y> &aAreaBase );
00043 
00044     void            set( T aX1, T aY1, T aX2, T aY2 );
00045         
00046     T               getWidth() const { return x2 - x1; }
00047     T               getHeight() const { return y2 - y1; }
00048     Vec2<T>         getSize() const { return Vec2<T>( x2 - x1, y2 - y1 ); }
00049     T               calcArea() const { return getWidth() * getHeight(); }
00050     
00051     void            clipBy( const AreaT<T> &clip );
00052     AreaT<T>        getClipBy( const AreaT<T> &clip ) const;
00053 
00055     void            offset( const Vec2<T> &off );
00057     AreaT<T>        getOffset( const Vec2<T> &off ) const;
00059     void            moveULTo( const Vec2<T> &newUL );
00061     AreaT<T>        getMoveULTo( const Vec2<T> &newUL ) const;
00063     void            expand( T expandX, T expandY ) { x1 -= expandX; x2 += expandX; y1 -= expandY; y2 += expandY; }
00064 
00065     T               getX1() const { return x1; }
00066     void            setX1( T aX1 ) { x1 = aX1; }
00067     T               getY1() const { return y1; }
00068     void            setY1( T aY1 ) { y1 = aY1; }
00069     T               getX2() const { return x2; }
00070     void            setX2( T aX2 ) { x2 = aX2; }
00071     T               getY2() const { return y2; }
00072     void            setY2( T aY2 ) { y2 = aY2; }
00073     Vec2<T>         getUL() const { return Vec2<T>( x1, y1 ); } // left-top offset
00074     Vec2<T>         getLR() const { return Vec2<T>( x2, y2 ); } // right-bottom offset
00075 
00076     bool            contains( const Vec2<T> &offset ) const;
00077     template<typename Y>
00078     bool            contains( const Vec2<Y> &offset ) const { return contains( Vec2<T>( (T)math<Y>::ceil( offset. x ), (T)math<Y>::ceil( offset.y ) ) ); }
00079     bool            intersects( const AreaT<T> &area ) const;
00080 
00081     T               x1, y1, x2, y2;
00082 
00083     bool            operator==( const AreaT<T> &aArea ) const { return ( ( x1 == aArea.x1 ) && ( y1 == aArea.y1 ) && ( x2 == aArea.x2 ) && ( y2 == aArea.y2 ) ); }
00084     bool            operator<( const AreaT<T> &aArea ) const;
00085 
00086     const AreaT<T>      operator+( const Vec2<T> &o ) const { return this->getOffset( o ); }
00087     const AreaT<T>      operator-( const Vec2<T> &o ) const { return this->getOffset( -o ); }
00088 
00089     AreaT<T>&       operator+=( const Vec2<T> &o ) { offset( o ); return *this; }
00090     AreaT<T>&       operator-=( const Vec2<T> &o ) { offset( -o ); return *this; }
00091 
00092     static AreaT<T> proportionalFit( const AreaT<T> &srcArea, const AreaT<T> &dstArea, bool center, bool expand = false );
00093 
00094     friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream &o, const AreaT<T> &area )
00095     {
00096         return o << "(" << area.x1 << ", " << area.y1 << ")-(" << area.x2 << ", " << area.y2 << ")";
00097     }   
00098 };
00099 
00100 typedef AreaT<int32_t>                      Area;
00101 typedef AreaT<boost::rational<int32_t> >    AreaRational;
00102 
00103 extern std::pair<Area,Vec2i> clippedSrcDst( const Area &srcSurfaceBounds, const Area &srcArea, const Area &dstSurfaceBounds, const Vec2i &dstLT );
00104 
00105 } // namespace cinder
